title: [Medicine] Case-controlled study conducted in Qatar found that three doses of BNT162b2 (Pfizer-BioNTech) vaccine and no prior infection had 52.3% effectiveness against symptomatic BA.2 infection. Two doses + prior infection was 55.1%. Three doses + prior infection was 77.3%. Previous infection alone was 46.1%.
[Medicine] Bipolar spectrum traits and the space between Madness and Genius: The Muse is in the Dose
